sections.heading: Hosting
content: Infrastructure and Node.js runtime managed through Infomaniak hosting services.

sections.heading: Data collected
content: When you submit a label application, we collect profile, project, analytics, and contact information from the form.
We also process technical anti-spam data such as captcha verification result and an anonymized IP hash.

sections.heading: Purpose and legal basis
content: Data is used to evaluate artist applications and communicate about potential collaboration.
Processing is based on legitimate interest and your explicit consent at submission time.

sections.heading: Retention
content: Applications are stored in a secured SQLite archive for operational follow-up.
You may request deletion or export of your data by contacting the label email address.

sections.heading: Your rights
content: You can request access, correction, deletion, or restriction regarding your personal data.

sections.heading: Scope
content: These terms govern access to the Nyvoro Records website and related application services.

sections.heading: User responsibilities
content: You agree to provide accurate information when submitting an application.
Automated abuse, spam, or malicious attempts are strictly prohibited.

sections.heading: Intellectual property
content: Site content, branding, and editorial materials are protected and remain the property of Nyvoro Records or their respective owners.
